required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: DENTAL CARE OF PATIENTS LIVING WITH HIV
clinical_study.official_title: DENTAL CARE OF PATIENTS LIVING WITH HIV, OR COINFECTED HIV / HBV OR HIV / HCV, FOLLOWED IN THE INFECTIOUS DISEASES DEPARTMENT OF CHU CLERMONT-FERRAND

brief_summary.textblock: This study is perform to identify oral diseases of people living with HIV (PLWHIV) or co-infected with HBV or HCV.

detailed_description.textblock: In the purpose of identifying oral diseases of people living with HIV (PLWHIV) or co-infected with HBV or HCV, we would recruit from 15 10 2021 to 15 04 2022 affiliated to social security scheme PLWHIV adults followed-up in the infectious diseases department of Clermont-Ferrand university hospital who accept participate in order to propose dental individual clinical exams. Anonymous socio-demograpic, medical and dental data will be reported in Redcap. Primary outcomes are the number and type of pathologies identified linked to HIV or not. Statistical analysed will be performed with Stata software. The population will be described by associated numbers and percentages for the categorical variables and by the mean Â± standard deviation or median [interquartile interval] for the quantitative variables, with respect to their statistical distribution.

primary_outcome.measure: description of oral disease linked to HIV or not.
primary_outcome.time_frame: During the scheduled consultation in the infectious diseases department of the Gabriel Montpied University Hospital in Clermont-Ferrand
primary_outcome.description: percentage of patients with oral disease linked to HIV and percentage of patients with oral disease not linked to HIV

secondary_outcome.measure: Study the factors associated with the presence of oral pathologies linked to HIV.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During the scheduled consultation in the infectious diseases department of the Gabriel Montpied University Hospital in Clermont-Ferrand
secondary_outcome.description: bivariate and multivariate analysis of demographic, immunovirologic factors and comorbidities associated to oral diseases linked to HIV

secondary_outcome.measure: Study the factors associated with the presence of oral pathologies unrelated to HIV.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During the scheduled consultation in the infectious diseases department of the Gabriel Montpied University Hospital in Clermont-Ferrand
secondary_outcome.description: bivariate and multivariate analysis of demographic, immunovirologic factors and comorbidities associated with the presence of oral pathologies unrelated to HIV

secondary_outcome.measure: Compare the prevalence of oral pathologies linked or not to HIV with that found in a previous study carried out in 2003.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During the scheduled consultation in the infectious diseases department of the Gabriel Montpied University Hospital in Clermont-Ferrand
secondary_outcome.description: comparison of prevalence of oral diseases in 2021 and those in 2003 in CHU Clermont Ferrand

secondary_outcome.measure: List the course of dental care of these people during the last 3 years.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During the scheduled consultation in the infectious diseases department of the Gabriel Montpied University Hospital in Clermont-Ferrand
secondary_outcome.description: % refusal care, % lost of dental follow-up

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult patient infected with HIV or co-infected with HIV / HBV or HIV / HCV followed in the Infectious Diseases department of Clermont-Ferrand University Hospital and affiliated to a social security scheme.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Minor patient
- Adult patient unable to express his non-opposition to participating in the study or patient who refuses to participate in the study.
